entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Fort Erie
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then becoming light after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High plus 4.
